titleStmt.title: Astronomical calendar (monthly planetary almanac for AD 107 to 115 and for 119/120)

msContents.summary: Papyrus fragments of an astronomical calendar, recording the movements of heavenly bodies with reference to the signs of the Zodiac.

msItem.note: Possibly the same hand and manuscript as P. Tebt. II 274
35 a recto 31 lines with the fibres, Verso blank; 35 b recto 10 lines with the fibres, Verso blank

provenance.p: Purchased in Berlin by Lund University Library in 1933, from prof. Carl Schmidt; Isabella Andorlini "Scavi e acquisti di papiri negli anni '30: il caso dei PLund" in Comunicazioni, Firenze 1995, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, p. 45-50

listBibl.bibl: P. Lund V 2 P. Tebt. II 274 M P 35 a 2015, 35 b 2016; TM 35 a 63530, 35 b 63406; LDAB 35 b 4614; R. Mercier, Consideration of the Greek symbol 'zero'; O. Neugebauer, Astronomical papyri and ostraca: bibliographical notes, Proceedings of the American philosophical society, vol. 106, 1962, p. 383-391
